projects.name: WealthNest
projects.summary: Investment & portfolio management platform with wallet management, portfolio tracking, and analytics dashboards.
projects.overview: WealthNest is a comprehensive investment and portfolio management system designed to help users track performance, manage digital wallets, and visualize financial insights in real time.
projects.contribution: Leading full‑stack development: secure APIs, modular backend systems, and responsive front‑end dashboards. Integrated cloud data pipelines and interactive charts for seamless financial visualization.

Dynamic analytics dashboards with real-time updates.

projects.name: SplitEx
projects.summary: Smart group expense manager with secure auth, expense verification, UPI‑QR settlements, admin dashboard, and PDF exports.
projects.overview: SplitEx is a web‑based group expense management system that simplifies how users split, verify, and settle shared costs. It provides clear summaries, interactive analytics, and PDF‑based reporting for transparent tracking.
projects.role: Independently designed and developed end‑to‑end (frontend + backend integration). Supports UPI‑QR settlements, real‑time verification, and admin control.
highlights: Real‑time expense tracking with group management.
Exportable summaries and receipts using jsPDF.
projects.outcome: Successfully deployed as an academic project with full functionality and professional documentation.

projects.name: UrbanNest
projects.summary: Delivery management prototype focused on real‑time tracking and customer coordination; built during a university hackathon.
projects.overview: UrbanNest is a mobile‑first prototype designed to streamline order delivery tracking and customer coordination. Developed during a university hackathon with focus on real‑time data, modern UI, and smooth UX.
projects.role: Team Lead coordinating a 4‑member group using agile principles. Designed app flow, managed integration between frontend components and REST APIs, and delivered under tight deadlines.
highlights: Integrated REST APIs for real‑time delivery status updates.
Presented and demoed to the university panel.
projects.outcome: Recognized during the hackathon for strong UI design and collaboration under time constraints.
